amendment.description: Amendment makes a number of technical, clarifying, and clerical changes to the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 110-174 to make a number of technical, clarifying, and clerical changes to several provisions of H.R. 2446 as reported by the Committee on Foreign Affairs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lantos amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Lantos.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lantos amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
